mapper.insert: insert into tbl_corporation(corporation_name, corporation_address, corporation_address_detail, corporation_owner, corporation_email, corporation_password, corporation_homepage, corporation_gen, corporation_sales) values (#{corporationName}, #{corporationAddress}, #{corporationAddressDetail}, #{corporationBusiness}, #{corporationOwner}, #{corporationEmail}, #{corporationPassword}, #{corporationHomepage}, #{corporationGen}, #{corporationSales})
